title: TFW You're a OOM Karthus in a teamfight.

replies.body:
Here I found a picture of OOM Karthus:
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_L78zEKWCMII/TQPxd6opk8I/AAAAAAAABL8/xdlW046qa2c/s1600/Blue+Caster+Minion.png
Nah, the attack speed is too high.
isnt that aatrox?

No, this is Aatrox.

http://i.imgur.com/XDuC8XR.png
Hey man give aatrox some credit here, he's AT LEAST a cannon minion http://i.imgur.com/qalvmFT.png
When did Aatrox become ranged? I know it's been a while since I saw him in game, but I could have sworn he was melee...
His ult does give him a longer basic attack range so I can see it.

> [{quoted}](name=Kingnewgameplus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cnF3VxOy,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-18T07:24:45.280+0000)
>
> Hey man give aatrox some credit here, he's AT LEAST a cannon minion http://i.imgur.com/qalvmFT.png

Isn't that Rumble?
no he's a melee minion after banner of command, but without the magic damage immunity.
Naw, the caster minion Morgana just happened to toss a Black Shield on him ;)

> [{quoted}](name=aspects1,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cnF3VxOy,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-01-18T01:13:23.788+0000)
>
> isnt that aatrox?

Aatrox loses power after he revives.
http://i.imgur.com/LeJjLMN.jpg

and then you decide to buy a {{item:3070}} 
http://fanaru.com/gossip-girl/image/100591-gossip-girl-not-be-weak.gif

One teamfight for Karthus I had ult up but zero mana, about three quarters health. Our team was strong enough to take them out if I went into passive so I flashed in and started auto attacking people to be annoying. They ignored me and I got a double kill.
[https://media.giphy.com/media/xIdqsZ5rmVifu/giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/xIdqsZ5rmVifu/giphy.gif)
Karthus main, can confirm

So you're the best Karthus in the EU yet you're also in NA?

Way to spread your influence.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/c85a51893cf7387b0721406573d45553/tumblr_mfi0s7fEaf1qdwq9to2_500.gif

This is actually really good. Have my upvote
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I always yell to myself "KILL ME SO I CAN ULT"
